languages.text: {n}Вокс Паскаля оживляется. С нотками любопытства в голосе он повелительно произносит:{/n} "Продемонстрируй объект, мирянка".
{n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс Паскаля оживляется. С нотками любопытства в голосе он повелительно произносит:{/n} "Продемонстрируй объект, мирянка".

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统响了起来，以专横的语气开了口。{/n}“把东西拿出来，外行人。”{n}不过，他的声音中还是流露出了好奇之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统响了起来，以专横的语气开了口。{/n}“把东西拿出来，外行人。”{n}不过，他的声音中还是流露出了好奇之意。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal restalla al activarse. Da una orden imperiosa:{/n} «Presente el objeto, mujer», {n}pero la curiosidad se filtra en su voz igualmente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal restalla al activarse. Da una orden imperiosa:{/n} «Presente el objeto, mujer», {n}pero la curiosidad se filtra en su voz igualmente.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスがパチパチいう音と共に戻ってくる。彼は彼女へと横柄に告げる。{/n}「物体を差し出せ、俗人よ」{n}しかしそれでも、その声には好奇心が滲みでていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスがパチパチいう音と共に戻ってくる。彼は彼女へと横柄に告げる。{/n}「物体を差し出せ、俗人よ」{n}しかしそれでも、その声には好奇心が滲みでていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox meldet sich knisternd. Gebieterisch sagt er:{/n} "Zeigt das Objekt, Laiin!"{n} Aber es liegt auch Neugier in seiner Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox meldet sich knisternd. Gebieterisch sagt er:{/n} "Zeigt das Objekt, Laiin!"{n} Aber es liegt auch Neugier in seiner Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait entendre.{/n} « Présentez l'objet, béotienne ! » {n}ordonne-t-il sur un ton impérieux qui laisse transparaître une pointe de curiosité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksundan cızırtılar çıkıyor. Reta'yla emredercesine konuşuyor.{/n} "Nesneyi göster avam kadın." {n}Sesindeki merakı gizleyemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox crackles to life. Imperiously, he tells her,{/n} "Present the object, laywoman," {n}but curiosity creeps into his voice nonetheless.{/n}
